title: ( NOT CLICKBAIT ) How to unlock the Secret Item! Riot doesn't want you to know this!
body:
So I was doing some item calculations and theorycrafting the other day and I came across an amazing discovery! However, it wouldn't be as great as possible if I didn't share it with you, so here I am to explain to you what I found.

In League there are 8 different boots to purchase
{{item:3006}} {{item:3117}} {{item:3009}} {{item:3158}} {{item:3047}} {{item:3020}} {{item:2422}} {{item:3111}} 

But actually there are 9 !

You see, the new footwear I will call Adaptive Runners
Why do I call it that? You might ask... because these boots give you the following stats depending on what type of damage your champion has more stats of either AP or AD

Adaptive Runners [ Boots Item / Limit One ]

Stats:
- 20 Ability Power or 14 Attack Damage [ Adaptive ]
- Unique Passive: + 45 Movement Speed
- Unique Passive: Reduces all summoner spell cooldowns by 10%

How do you unlock this item? Well it actually requires a series of steps, cheat codes you might call them.

1 You must take the Sorcery Rune as either your second or first pathway
2 You must take the Transcendence Rune
3 You must enter a Summoners Rift or ARAM match and obtain at least 30% CDR through items without any boot related items [ Can take 2 - 3 Items ]
4 Reach Level 10 on your champion in the match
5 Purchase Ionian Boots of Lucidity
6 Enjoy your hybrid adaptive damage boots

replies.body: Ionian + Shard + Transcendence + Blue Buff = %40 right there. Any additional CDR will be adaptive stats.

Cosmic insight doesn't do anything bad to transcendence. 

You can also bring the CDR offensive rune

Cosmic Insight gives you an additional 5% max CDR so your CDR is converted to Adaptive Damage at the 40% cap, if you did take the Cosmic Insight Rune however then you would have to buy at least 35% max CDR which causes more item slot inefficiency and other problems for champions with specific build paths which isn't what I wanted. I just want to give you some innovative damage boots

Also the CDR offensive runes scale from Level 1 - 18 ( so you would have to wait until level 18 to reach this strats maximum potential which I don't want to happen either )
